title: Kirill Dmitriev, Putin's loyal intermediary, plays a central role in Trump's Ukraine plan
subhead: The banker has emerged as the key intermediary between the Kremlin and the White House, co-authoring – alongside US President Donald Trump's special envoy, Steve Witkoff, himself a prominent figure in the business world – a draft peace agreement that is sharply tilted in Moscow's favor.

title: The overlooked issue of domestic violence against elderly women
subhead: Among all women killed by their partners in France in 2024, 26% were over the age of 70, a figure that is on the rise. Yet, the murders of these women and the possible abuse that preceded them are poorly documented.
